docs.lead_paragraph: Federal Reserve policy makers were surprised by the strength of the United States economy when they met in January, according to minutes of their meeting.

headline.main: Undeterred, Fed on Track to Temper Its Stimulus
headline.print_headline: Undeterred, Fed on Track to Temper Its Stimulus

docs.abstract: Minutes of Federal Reserve meeting in January shows policy makers were surprised by the strength of economy, cheered by optimism of consumers and convinced they should continue to dismantle Fed's economic stimulus campaign; account leaves little doubt Fed intends to steadily reduce purchases of Treasury and mortgage-backed securities.
docs.snippet: Federal Reserve policy makers were surprised by the strength of the United States economy when they met in January, according to minutes of their meeting.
